bAutoDisable: Auto-manage enabling and disabling the submix as a CPU optimization. It will be disabled if the submix and all child submixes are silent. It will re-enable if a sound is sent to the submix or a child submix is audible.
AutoDisableTime: The minimum amount of time to wait before automatically disabling a submix if it is silent. Will immediately re-enable if source audio is sent to it.
ChildSubmixes: Child submixes to this sound mix

methods.name: DynamicConnect
DynamicDisconnect
methods.doc:
Dynamically Disconnect from a parent.

methods.name: FindDynamicAncestor
methods.doc:
Searching upwards from this Submix to the root looking for the first Submix marked Dynamic
If this Submix is Dynamic this will be returned.
